Class GuiParticleHelpers

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.guiControl.GuiParticleHelpers
public class GuiParticleHelpers extends Object
Helper class for particle/visual effects previously living in GuiController.

It provides small convenience methods to spawn explosions, row-clear particles and to flash rows; all methods are best-effort and tolerate a missing particle pane or board view.
